sentences.en: After a while, the rich sauce begins to cloy.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿，浓味沙司开始显得油腻了。

sentences.en: Chocolates start to cloy if you eat too many.
sentences.cn: 巧克力糖吃太多就会腻.

sentences.en: Chocolates start to cloy if you eat too much.
sentences.cn: 假如你吃太多巧克力会使你倒胃口.

sentences.en: Her sweet submissive smile began to cloy after a while.
sentences.cn: 不久，她那种甜甜的媚笑开始让人厌烦了。

sentences.en: The pleasures of idleness soon cloy.
sentences.cn: 无所事事的享乐很快就使人厌烦了.

trans.tran_en: if something sweet or pleasant cloys, it begins to annoy you because there is too much of it
